rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0001
rows.name: Something wrong, Menou?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0002
rows.name: What's up, Menou?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0003
rows.name: Is everything okay, Menou?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0004
rows.name: What's the deal, Menou?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0005
rows.name: Take a look at this.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0006
rows.name:
...The walls and floors of these ruins...
What do you think they're made of?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0007
rows.name: Just rocks?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0008
rows.name:
I thought so too, at first. Just regular
stone, hewn and stacked, right? But...

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0009
rows.name:
With natural materials, processed and
put together, you'd expect some flaws,
some deformations somewhere...

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0010
rows.name:
And with this ruin shooting up into the
sky like this...even small variations at
ground level would cause it to tilt over.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0011
rows.name: So how do you think it was made?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0012
rows.name: What's your theory, then?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0013
rows.name:
In that case, what do you think
is the origin?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0014
rows.name: So how do you reckon it got made?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0015
rows.name:
Well, the treated blocks were stacked
up into the sky, with perfect accuracy
and no errors. That much is true.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0016
rows.name: But the strength of it is unparalleled.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0017
rows.name:
Over hundreds, thousands, or tens of
thousands of years, the walls and
floors didn't break or become brittle...

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0019
rows.name: Amazing work by people from age past!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0020
rows.name:
At our level of technology,
it's unimaginable.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0021
rows.name:
I marvel at the minerals and materials
used to create this site, though I don't
pretend to understand them...

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0022
rows.name:
The whole World Tree is a mystery,
for sure...

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0023
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0024
rows.name: You sound pretty thrilled.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0025
rows.name: No bugs around here, eh?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0026
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0027
rows.name: You seem pretty excited.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0028
rows.name: Seems relatively bug-free.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0029
rows.name: How shall I proceed?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0030
rows.name: You seem quite thrilled.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0031
rows.name: There don't seem to be any bugs here.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0032
rows.name: What do I say now?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0033
rows.name: Someone sounds excited!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0034
rows.name: No bugs here, eh...?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0101
rows.name: Obviously!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0102
rows.name:
I'm curious about the construction,
of course, but more than that, I love
the adventure of it!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0103
rows.name:
Just thinking about the ancient people
who built this place, about their hopes
and dreams...

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0104
rows.name:
And these symbols I can't read... Are
they knowledge? Are they a warning?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0105
rows.name:
All these objects made of materials
I've never seen before!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0106
rows.name:
Just being here makes me feel so alive,
makes my mind soar!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0107
rows.name: I understand completely!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0108
rows.name: Yeah, I think I know what you mean.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0109
rows.name:
Hah...
I feel like I understand.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0110
rows.name:
I get that!
Bang on.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0111
rows.name:
I can't even imagine how many people
had to work on making a building as
enormous as this one...

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0112
rows.name:
Even just this wall probably took
dozens of people hours, if not days...

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0113
rows.name:
All of these people's blood, sweat and
tears, sealed in these walls of stone.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0114
rows.name:
This place stands as a testament to
the wills of those who came before.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0115
rows.name:
This place is like a crystallization of
the ancients' wills.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0116
rows.name:
That would make this place a
crystallization of their wills.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0117
rows.name:
So this place is like a testament to
the wills of the ancient people.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0118
rows.name: Hah, that's a nice way to put it.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0119
rows.name:
But yes, this wonderful lasting tribute
is one of a kind on Alst.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0120
rows.name:
We should make sure to search the
ruins thoroughly and find all we can
about the ancient inhabitants!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0201
rows.name:
Hey!
You almost sound disappointed!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0202
rows.name:
I for one am quite glad that the inside
of the World Tree is a bug-free zone!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0203
rows.name:
You know, since it's called a tree, I was
afraid there might be all sorts of creepy
crawlies nesting here...

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0204
rows.name:
Oh, is that why you were exploring so
happily?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0205
rows.name:
So that's why you were so cheerful
while exploring!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0206
rows.name: Is that why your spirits were so high?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0207
rows.name:
Ah, so that's why you're so
bloody jolly!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0208
rows.name: Exactly!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0209
rows.name:
I love minerals, like, a lot! And I hate
bugs about the same amount...

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0210
rows.name:
In fact, I think that the more I love
geology, the more I hate bugs.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0211
rows.name:
That's a lot of hate then. I wonder how
you'd handle diving in the Cloud Sea...

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0212
rows.name: I fail to see the connection...

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0213
rows.name: That's...an interesting rationalization.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0214
rows.name: That's a hell of a theory...

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0215
rows.name: Sorry to keep Masterpon waiting!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0216
rows.name:
Ah, Hana, just in time!
Masterpon starving.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0217
rows.name: Hana collected only best ingredients.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0218
rows.name:
What could you possibly collect
in a place like this...?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0219
rows.name: What did you find?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0220
rows.name:
Whatcha got, then?
Can I have some?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0221
rows.name: What have you found?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0222
rows.name:
So, what's for dinner then?
I want some too!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0223
rows.name:
Is delicacy when fried!
Jabara Bugs!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0224
rows.name: Get them awayyyyyy!!!
